spearheadEnhancements.name: Monstrously Tough
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This greedy gargant always takes the juiciest spoils of battle and has an impressive gut as a result.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Your general has a Health characteristic of 15 instead of 12.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Lanky Git
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This long-legged gargant strides across the battlefield at a frightening pace.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: When you make a **charge** roll for your general, roll 3D6 instead of 2D6.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Furiously Territorial
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Nothing infuriates this gargant more than pipsqueaks laying claim to the lands around them.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by your general that target an enemy unit that is contesting an objective you do not control.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Extra-big Bag
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Made from the tattered remains of enemy banners, even more screaming warriors can be stuffed into this large and garish bag.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: When your general uses their ‘Stuff ’Em In Me Bag’ ability, you can pick 2 enemy units instead of 1 (roll for each).

battleTraits.name: Gargant Charge
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: A charging gargant will flatten anyone in their path.
battleTraits.declare: Pick any number of enemy units within 1" of a friendly ****MEGA-GARGANT**** or ****GARGANT**** unit that charged this turn to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on each target.

battleTraits.name: Earthshaking Roar
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: A blast of this gargant’s hot, stinking breath delivered at volume bowls over those nearby.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑**GARGANT**** or ****GARGANT**** unit that has not used a ****RAMPAGE**** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Timberrrrr!
battleTraits.lore: A dying gargant is a weapon of ruin in its own right, though it is anyone’s guess where their body will fall.
battleTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **MEGA‑**GARGANT**** or ****GARGANT**** model is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

battleTraits.name: Colossal Slam
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: The Mega-Gargant hoicks the foe over their shoulder and slams them full force into the ground.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‐**GARGANT**** that has not used a ****RAMPAGE**** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy ****MONSTER**** or ****WAR MACHINE**** that has a unit size of 1 and is within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again within 1" of the unit using this ability. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

battleTraits.name: Jump Up and Down
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: A gargant’s massive, stomping feet are devastating against smaller opponents.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑**GARGANT**** or ****GARGANT**** unit that has not used a ****RAMPAGE**** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy ****INFANTRY**** unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. If the unit using this ability is a ****GARGANT****, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 6. If it is a ****MEGA-GARGANT**,** inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 5+.

battleTraits.name: Bellowing Roar
battleTraits.lore: An ear-splitting bellow let loose by a Mancrusher can send the enemy battleline into disarray.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit to use this ability, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target, then roll a dice.
battleTraits.effect: On a 2+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by the target unit this phase.

battleTraits.name: 'Grab Those Rocks and Chuck 'Em!'
battleTraits.lore: Your general commands their fellow gargants to hurl as many rocks at the enemy as they can.
battleTraits.declare: Pick your general to use this ability, then pick another friendly unit wholly within 12" of them.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s **Throwin’ Rocks** this turn.

heroicTraits.name: Monstrously Tough
heroicTraits.lore: This Mega-Gargant is incredibly hard to kill.
heroicTraits.effect: This unit has a Health characteristic of 40 instead of 35.

heroicTraits.name: Furious Temper
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.lore: Nothing can stop this Mega-Gargant when the rage of battle clouds their mind.
heroicTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.
• Subtract 1 from save rolls for this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Rabble Rouser
heroicTraits.lore: This Mega-Gargant bellows at their kin to race forward and pummel the enemy into the dust.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to **charge** rolls for friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Glowy Shield of Protectiness
artefactsOfPower.lore: While raiding a lair belonging to the ratty pipsqueaks, this gargant found a shield studded with sickly green rock – and promptly strapped it to their body. Enemies who get close sometimes have their heads explode, which is always good for a laugh.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat **attack** that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the ****FIGHT**** ability has been resolved.

artefactsOfPower.name: Kingslaughter Cowl
artefactsOfPower.lore: Those who wear this blood-encrusted leather hood make it their business to crush upstart monarchs and warlords across the realms.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while this unit is in combat with an enemy ****HERO****.

artefactsOfPower.name: Glowy Lantern
artefactsOfPower.lore: Stolen from the aelves of Hysh after a botched alliance, this aetherquartz jar was at first carried around just because it was shiny; however, over time, it has granted this Mega-Gargant an innate power over malign sorceries.
artefactsOfPower.effect: This unit can use ****SUMMON**** abilities from the **manifestation** lore you picked during army composition as if it had ****WIZARD** (1)**.

artefactsOfPower.name: Extra-calloused Feet
artefactsOfPower.lore: This gargant has become so used to stomping on even the toughest enemies that their feet are legendary weapons in their own right.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic, Rend characteristic and Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Almighty Stomp** or **Almightier Stomp**.

artefactsOfPower.name: Amberstone Totem
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: Somewhere along the way, this gargant has picked up a totem of Ghurish realmstone. No matter how long they run for, the urge to hunt burns within them.
artefactsOfPower.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use ****CHARGE**** abilities even if it used a ****RUN**** ability in the same turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Mantle of Tusk and Horns
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: Trophies taken from slain behemoths adorn the shoulders of this gargant, and through them they can channel the power of the Waaagh!.
artefactsOfPower.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Foe-Chompers
regimentAbilities.lore: The Mancrushers hoist hapless enemies up into the air mid-battle, letting them tumble into their cavernous jaws before giving a mighty belch of satisfaction.
regimentAbilities.effect: Each time an enemy model is slain by a friendly unit’s ‘Stuff ’Em In Me Bag’ ability, **Heal (D3)** that unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Earth-Shaking Charge
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Any Charge Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: The ground shakes as the colossal gargants charge head-first into the fray.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that charged this phase to use this ability, then roll a dice for each enemy unit in combat with it.
regimentAbilities.effect: On a 3+, that enemy unit has **STRIKE-LAST** this turn.

regimentOfRenown.name: What're You Lookin' At?
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
regimentOfRenown.lore: Bleary eyes narrowed, the gargant picks a fight with a cocky-looking target.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick this unit to use this ability if it charged this turn and has not used a ****RAMPAGE**** ability this turn. Then, pick an enemy unit within 9" of this unit to be the target.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Roll 2D6. This unit can **move** a number of inches equal to the roll. It can pass through enemy models and must end that **move** in combat with the target.

regimentOfRenown.name: Bellowing Mockery
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
regimentOfRenown.lore: Drunken gargants often holler incoherent insults to aggravate and taunt.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick this unit to use this ability if it has not used a ****RAMPAGE**** ability this turn, then pick an enemy unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

regimentOfRenown.name: Projectile Vomit
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
regimentOfRenown.lore: Better out than in, as they say...
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick this unit to use this ability if it has not used a ****RAMPAGE**** ability this turn. Then, pick a point on the battlefield within 6" of this unit and pick all other units (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point to be the targets.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Big Mouth
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a friendly MEGA-GARGANT
abilities.lore: Mancrusher Gargants are used to being bossed around by the colossal Mega-Gargants. The orders they are given usually boil down to ‘hit that thing’ or ‘squish them ones there’.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **GARGANT** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Revel in War
abilities.lore: These boisterous gargants launch themselves into enemy lines, revelling in crushing the puny pipsqueaks below their feet.
abilities.effect: You can pick 2 friendly **MEGA‑GARGANTS** or **GARGANT** units that have not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use the ‘Jump Up and Down’ ability instead of 1.

abilities.name: Besieging Bulk
abilities.lore: When a group of Mega-Gargants take to battle together, they are able to use each other’s enormous bulk to shelter themselves from harm.
abilities.effect: Friendly **MEGA-GARGANTS** have **WARD (6+)** while they are within the combat ranges of any other friendly **MEGA-GARGANTS**.

abilities.name: More Stuff For Me Collection
abilities.lore: These gargants are avaricious hoarders who love collecting all kinds of baubles and artefacts – even ones that are too small for them to use.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE SONS OF BEHEMAT HERO** that does not have an artefact of power.
abilities.effect:
Give that **HERO** 1 artefact of power from ‘Titanic Trophies’.

**Designer’s Note:** *This artefact of power is given to the unit during the deployment phase, not during army composition.*
